package.name: iCaughtU 12
package.shortDescription: The most advanced tweak to improve the protection of your device.

descriptionlist.description:
ICaughtU 12 is the most advanced tweak to protect your device from theft.
He has truly great potential. Among them: • Notification of an incorrectly entered password via SMS or e-mail • Taking a picture from the front camera when unlocking and trying to turn off your device • Notification of the location of the device and battery status • Protection of some switches in the Control Center from the possibility of shutdown • And more much more ...
